accessibility.text: So I thought: “let me automate this”
there lived a pretty typical software engineer…
So I thought: “let me automate this”
there lived a pretty typical software engineer…
So I created a new Github repo
Wrote 20-odd lines of JavaScript and then wondered:
“Where shall I host this?”
So I thought: “let me automate this”
there lived a pretty typical software engineer…
So I created a new Github repo
Wrote 20-odd lines of JavaScript and then wondered:
“Where shall I host this?”
“How can I test this?”
So I thought: “let me automate this”
there lived a pretty typical software engineer…
So I created a new Github repo
Wrote 20-odd lines of JavaScript and then wondered:
“Where shall I host this?”
“How can I test this?”
“How can I make sure it is behind SSL?”
So I thought: “let me automate this”
there lived a pretty typical software engineer…
So I created a new Github repo
Wrote 20-odd lines of JavaScript and then wondered:
“Where shall I host this?”
“How can I test this?”
“How can I make sure it is behind SSL?”
“I wonder if there is anything cool on HackerNews?”
So I thought: “let me automate this”
there lived a pretty typical software engineer…
So I created a new Github repo
Wrote 20-odd lines of JavaScript and then wondered:
“Where shall I host this?”
“How can I test this?”
“How can I make sure it is behind SSL?”
“I wonder if there is anything cool on HackerNews?”
Wait… what was I doing again?
